name: Quirk
summary:
Build your own vehicles and gizmos, create epic games, design your own home, unlock crazy cool weapons, craft your rpg character, and play many types of games (pvp and pve) in Quirk - the ultimate sandbox mmo game for kids!

With hundreds of blocks, weapons, and gadgets at your fingertips, you can design your own toys, playgrounds, and video gaming experiences to share and play with the community.
